def_cn: （用于名词或形容词前构成形容词）表示“全…”，“纯…”
def_en: All- is added to nouns or adjectives in order to form adjectives which describe something as consisting only of the thing mentioned or as having only the quality indicated.

def_cn: （用于现在分词或形容词前构成形容词）表示“全面的”
def_en: All- is added to present participles or adjectives in order to form adjectives which describe something as including or affecting everything or everyone.

def_cn: （用于名词前构成形容词）表示“适合各种…的”，“包含各种…的”
def_en: All- is added to nouns in order to form adjectives which describe something as being suitable for or including all types of a particular thing.
